arts.ttl: Unfancied Botafogo stun Champions League winners PSG at Club World Cup
arts.sum: PSG 0-1 Botafogo: The Brazilian side produced the shock of the Club World Cup so far against the tournament favourites

arts.ttl: Friday’s briefing: Lionel Messi stars at Club World Cup and Botafogo stun PSG
arts.sum: The Herons closed in on the knockout stage, while Chelsea will look for a second Group D win on Friday.

arts.ttl: PSG vs. Botafogo: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: While South American teams have coped well in the United States so far, this is an almighty test for Fogo, who entered the tournament with fairly tame expectations after a indifferent start to the 2025 season. The upcoming duel sees Europe’s best face off against South America’s top dog, with Botafogo entering the tournament as Copa Libertadores holders while PSG claimed UEFA Champions League glory in some style at the end of May.

PSG got their Club World Cup campaign off to the perfect start as they eased to a 4-0 win over Atletico Madrid. Botafogo also made a winning start to the competition as they beat Seattle Sounders 2-1...

arts.ttl: Is PSG vs Botafogo on TV? How to watch Club World Cup games for free
arts.sum: European champions PSG will face Copa Libertadores holders Botafogo in one of the biggest games of the tournament so far
